DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , 2-period , 2-treatment-sequence crossover study determine relative bioavailability pacritinib follow administration 400 mg oral dose four 100 mg pacritinib capsule 80 mg dose oral solution characterize PK major human metabolites pacritinib .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Relative Bioavailability Pacritinib Following Oral Administration Capsule Solution Formulations Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Twelve healthy subject enrol study ( 6 subject per sequence ) single clinical site intent 12 subject complete Periods 1 2 study . Subjects randomly assign 2 possible sequence ( 6 subject per sequence ) Day 1 Period 1 . Subjects randomly assign 2 possible sequence . Each subject receive 2 treatment ( 400 mg oral dose four 100 mg pacritinib capsule 80 mg oral solution dose pacritinib ) 2-period crossover design . Each treatment administer monotherapy 1 2 treatment period 7-day washout period administration study medication .

2. history clinical manifestation clinically significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic ( eg , hepatitis ) , renal , hematologic , gastrointestinal ( eg , celiac disease , peptic ulcer , gastroesophageal reflux , inflammatory bowel disease ) , metabolic , allergic , dermatological , neurological , psychiatric disorder ( determined Investigator consultation Sponsor ; appendectomy cholecystectomy consider clinically significant event ) ; 3. significant abnormality liver function test ( alanine aminotransferase , aspartate aminotransferase , alkaline phosphatase > 1.5 × upper limit normal [ ULN ] ; gammaglutamyl transferase > 2 × ULN ; total bilirubin > 1.3 × ULN ) kidney function test ( serum creatinine > ULN ) consider clinically significant Investigator , consultation Sponsor ; 4. history malignancy , except follow : cancer determine cured remission ≥5 year , curatively resect basal cell squamous cell skin cancer , cervical cancer situ , resect colonic polyp ;
